entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:26 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -25.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 11:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -25.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 49 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -32.9°C
Wind: W 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
